caseTitle: In the Matter of Murder of 8 Years Old Minor Girl at Kasur
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE MIAN SAQIB NISAR, CJ
tagline:
The Court, in the matter of murder of 8 years old minor girl in Kasur, directs that the challan be submitted within stipulated period in the Trial Court, Prosecutor General Punjab shall supervise the proceedings of the prosecution before the
Trial Court and allegation leveled by journalist Dr. Shahid Masood regarding 37 banks accounts be probed.
